verbose_text: In contrast to CR4, blockade of complement receptor CR3 completely abolished the increased uptake of C3 opsonized RBCs by MGCs (XREF_FIG A), and such uptake was also absent in MGCs derived from BMMs of CD11b-knockout mice (XREF_FIG B).
evidence: blockade of complement receptor CR3 completely abolished the increased uptake of C3-opsonized RBCs
